hint.title: The same IO-Device several times
hint.text: Do you know that you can add the same IO-Device twice. You can add a device temporarily at runtime, or copy the DLL file in the pluginfolder to add it permanently.

hint.title: Own IO-Device
hint.text: You can build your own IO-Device, read the PDF in the help folder.

hint.title: Own Assembler commands
hint.text: You can define your own assembler commands, read the PDF in the help folder and extend the Excel table in the res folder.

hint.title: Shortcuts
hint.text: You can use shortcuts for some commands. You can lookup the shotcut in the tooltip of a button.

hint.title: Custom Layouts
hint.text: Did you know that you can define up to three custom layouts. Just click on the buttons Custom 1-3 to save or load a layout.
